name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and cloud solutions with **AWS**. Proficient in building serverless applications utilizing services such as **Cognito**, **Lambda**, **S3**, **EC2**, **SES**, and **API Gateway**, ensuring high performance in fast-paced environments. Strong background in database management with **PostgreSQL** and designing **RESTful APIs**.

Proven success in applying Agile methodologies (Scrum) and best practices such as TDD, DRY, and SOLID principles to create maintainable and scalable solutions. A solid understanding of AI integrations and a commitment to delivering compliant applications aligned with industry standards. Additionally, I leverage **Git** and **GitLab** for version control and collaborate effectively within teams to drive project success.
